title: Gladys Knight & The Pips Studio Discography
description:
Gladys Knight and The Pips - Complete Studio Album Discography
Are you a Gladys Fan? Looking for rare albums? Where here is your dream come true. This is the complete discography, according to Wikipedia in July of 2013, of studio albums from Gladys Knight and The Pips', Gladys Knight's solo albums, and The Pips without Gladys Knight. Compilations and live albums are not included, to prevent redundant entries. All songs have been carefully tagged for album, artist, song, and cover art. The following albums are included: 

1962 Gladys Knight & The Pips - Letter Full of Tears
1964 Gladys Knight & The Pips - Gladys Knight & The Pips
1967 Gladys Knight & The Pips - Everybody Needs Love
1968 Gladys Knight & The Pips - Feelin' Bluesy
1968 Gladys Knight & The Pips - Silk N' Soul
1969 Gladys Knight & The Pips - Nitty Gritty
1971 Gladys Knight & The Pips - If I Were Your Woman
1972 Gladys Knight & The Pips - Standing Ovation
1973 Gladys Knight & The Pips - All I Need is Time
1973 Gladys Knight & The Pips - Imagination
1973 Gladys Knight & The Pips - Neither One of Us
1974 Gladys Knight & The Pips - Claudine Soundtrack
1974 Gladys Knight & The Pips - I Feel A Song
1975 Gladys Knight & The Pips - 2nd Anniversary
1975 Gladys Knight & The Pips - Bless This House
1976 Gladys Knight & The Pips - Pipe Dreams Soundtrack
1977 Gladys Knight & The Pips - Still Together
1978 Gladys Knight & The Pips - The One And Only
1980 Gladys Knight & The Pips - About Love
1981 Gladys Knight & The Pips - Touch
1982 Gladys Knight & The Pips - That Special Time of Year
1983 Gladys Knight & The Pips - Visions
1985 Gladys Knight & The Pips - Life
1987 Gladys Knight & The Pips - All Our Love
1978 Gladys Knight - Miss Gladys Knight
1979 Gladys Knight - Gladys Knight
1991 Gladys Knight - Good Woman
1994 Gladys Knight - Just For You
1998 Gladys Knight - Many Different Roads
2001 Gladys Knight - At Last
2005 Gladys Knight - One Voice
2006 Gladys Knight - A Christmas Celebration
2006 Gladys Knight - Before Me
1977 The Pips - At Last... The Pips
1978 The Pips - Callin'
